Log a message to a file

Source: R/utils.R
log_message.Rd

Log a message to a file

Usage

log_message(
  log_file,
  message,
  context = NULL,
  type = c("INFO", "ACTION", "WARNING", "ERROR"),
  print_level = 1
)

init_log_file(
  usensys_dir,
  log_file = "log.txt",
  case_id = NULL,
  replace = FALSE
)

delete_log_file(
  usensys_dir = NULL,
  log_file = file.path(usensys_dir, "log.txt")
)

Arguments

log_file

character path to the log file

message

character message to log

context

optional additional context to log

type

character log type, one of 'INFO', 'WARNING', 'ACTION', 'ERROR'

Functions

  • init_log_file(): Initialize a log file

  • delete_log_file(): Delete a log file
